text: That has been the easiest way to do it. We used to do some custom choice boxes, with the cta id inside them, but that just got complicated.
Ah true, good point to do it by putting in a RTM. Thanks!
The whole "putting regular modules in custom modules" feature feels really half-baked to me
UI is pretty awkward and you can't use export_to_template_context, which is what I usually want to do if I'm writing out a module directly
Does anyone know of a good service where you can enter urls and get the page HTML source returned as a mass operation?
we are trying to move a person to HS and we want to backup their current LP's but there is no way to get it in bulk from the provider they are using
